subtasks: Evaluate current inso phase (El Nino or La Nina)
Adjust planting schedule based on expected weather (delay or proceed early)
Anticipate climate change impacts (e.g., warmer, drier growing seasons)
Prepare practices for future challenges (improved irrigation, resistant varieties)

tasks.task: Implement water scheduling for hot and dry conditions
subtasks: Monitor soil moisture and apply irrigation as needed
Avoid consecutive peanut plantings to reduce soil pest buildup
Monitor for insects and treat as necessary
Invest in drought-resistant and aflatoxin-tolerant varieties
